extendedInfo.description: Put your Pictures into Google Maps and Street View then share them.Now with Facebook and Twitter upload of Screenshots of Google StreetViews and Maps plus your tagged geolocated pics.Plus directions on foot/car/bike/public transport displayed as text or on maps.NOTE- Developed & tested on a Samsung S2 & HTC Hero. So I don't know how it performs on other phones.Display/resize/move your own pictures around in StreetView then share your tagged Gps positioned pictures on Google StreetView and Google Maps with others by MMS,E-MAIL or upload to FACEBOOK and TWITTER.Plus go from Pin to Pin and see the distances.Track your position, distances and tagged pictures with GPS and instantly share them.Map + Compass.Use predefined tags on map - "Here I Am", or create your own.Add comments to your pictures to be displayed on StreetView/ Map then share with others.Full search facility plus locate by latitude and longitude.Requires SDCARD.

reviews.title: Dawa Tshering sherpa
reviews.comment: Yes, it is nice to use
reviews.author: Dawa T Sherpa

reviews.comment: would of been better if it gave u the option to write in a address you want to view
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Would be even greater if it showed street view from the pedestrian level so you could see a destination and your position at the street plane level.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: if it actually worked it would be a cool app. From the picture screen none of the buttons work. Tried posting to Facebook, didn\'t work.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: AndrewAyr
reviews.comment: The maps need updated for a start, they are over 10 years old. A building near me opened in 2001 isn\'t there. An Android equivalent of Nokia\'s City Lens would be good, but I can\'t find one.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: This app Sucks Big time
reviews.comment: Everytime I go and try to take a picture of the location I\'ve entered it forces a close!!!! Not worth the time or space needed to download!!!
reviews.author: A Google User
